item.title: Comment on WordPress Resources at SiteGround by A WordPress Commenter
item.dc:creator: A WordPress Commenter
item.description: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from <a href="https://gravatar.com"/ rel="nofollow ugc">Gravatar</a>.
item.content:encoded:
Hi, this is a comment.
To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard.
Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Comment on Post With Threaded Comments by Brian Gardner
item.dc:creator: Brian Gardner
item.description: This is an example of a comment made on a post. You can either edit the comment, delete the comment or reply to the comment. Use this as a place to respond to the post or to share what you are thinking.
item.content:encoded: This is an example of a comment made on a post. You can either edit the comment, delete the comment or reply to the comment. Use this as a place to respond to the post or to share what you are thinking.

item.title: Comment on Post With Threaded Comments by Brian Gardner
item.dc:creator: Brian Gardner
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/threaded-comments/#comment-6">Brian Gardner</a>.
This is an example of a nested threaded comment which is new in WordPress 2.7. This is where you can reply to a comment that was previously made, and visually makes reading comments to much easier.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Brian Gardner.

This is an example of a nested threaded comment which is new in WordPress 2.7. This is where you can reply to a comment that was previously made, and visually makes reading comments to much easier.
